categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Siskeen system was a system in the Hunnoverrs sector.

One of the system's gas giants, Kaer, held the Kaer Orbital Platform and the Kaer Station that was later used as a base and headquarters by the Black Sun sector Vigo Lun Rask. It also contained the planets Siskeen and Olanet.

The system was controlled by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. Early in the conflict, the InterGalactic Banking Clan built the Kaer Orbital Platform. It was taken by Jedi General Jor Drakas for the Republic.
In Legacy 37, Siskeen system is erroneously placed into Arkanis sector.
